definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
(technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面僅就已觀察到的幾種傘形科植物的反應予以說明。

sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤積，說明當時她的心臟還在跳動。

sentences.english: The number of books, and the rate of reading them, matters not a whit. It’s not a competition.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀的數量，以及速率說明不了什麼。

sentences.english: Finally, an application example of excavator design was proposed to illuminate the reconstruction of traditional functions.
sentences.chinese: 最後，以挖掘機設計目標爲例，進行了函數改造說明。

sentences.english: The result evidently indicates a possible halo-like neutron skin of 13C.
sentences.chinese: 這說明13C可能存在着一個類暈的中子皮。

sentences.english: The values obtained with toroidal cores at room temperature unless otherwise shown.
sentences.chinese: 無說明，各項數值均系環型磁芯在室溫下測得。

sentences.english: The result of running-in indicates that the refitting project is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 試運轉及裝車路試說明，改裝設計方案是可行的。

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 這說明家庭自動化的大趨勢就是自己動手。

sentences.english: Form-filling guides and the required courses for specialization could be found in the application form.
sentences.chinese: 填表說明及專業方向對應課程詳見申請表。

sentences.english: Compared with numerical control, its broad future in application is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 並與數控機械加工比較，說明它適用的廣泛前景。

sentences.english: No data are available to support a correlation between RGV and adverse event rates.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚無數據說明RGV與不良事件率之間的聯繫。

sentences.english: This topic explains how to sort your recordset.
sentences.chinese: 本主題說明如何對記錄集排序。

sentences.english: Thee comic is an ironical illustration that it is unadvisable to search for a shortcut to learning.
sentences.chinese: 漫畫是一種諷刺的說明，這是不可取的尋找學習捷徑。

sentences.english: An exception specifier can omit the parameter name when a catch needs to know only the type of the exception in order to handle it.
sentences.chinese: 說明符的類型決定了處理代碼能夠捕獲的異常種類。

sentences.english: The 6th house illustrates the relationship between our health and work.
sentences.chinese: 第六宮說明了健康與工作的關係。
將簽入說明與變更集相關聯。

definition: proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
